resources.name: Get User
resources.description:
This will be the path to obtain the data of a specific user registered in the application, if the identifier is not found the 404 error message will be returned and no response will be obtained.

```response:404
  {
    "message": "Not Found"
  }
```

This will be the path to obtain the data of a specific user registered in the application, if the token and the identifier are found, the message of 200 will be returned

```response:200
    {
   "_id":"62761bc560fa60b23ffb9ba3",
   "username":"juarezgonz",
   "email":"juarezgonz02@gmail.com",
   "date-of-birth":"28/10/2001",
   "name":"Oscar Alexander Juarez",
   "rol":"Admin",
   "createdAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
   "updatedAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
   "__v":0
}
```

resources.name: Get Users
resources.description:
This will be the path to obtain the data of a list of users registered in the application

|Parameter| Description|
|---------|-------------|
|Limit|Limit of users to obtain|

```response:200
  {
   "count":2,
   "users":[
      {
         "_id":"62761bc560fa60b23ffb9ba3",
         "username":"juarezgonz",
         "email":"juarezgonz02@gmail.com",
         "date-of-birth":"28/10/2001",
         "name":"Oscar Alexander Juarez",
         "rol":"Admin",
         "createdAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "updatedAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "__v":0
      },
      {
         "_id":"62768579fb3fa259e78928d0",
         "username":"victorcortez358",
         "email":"victorcortezr@gmail.com",
         "name":"Victor Rafael Valenzuela Cortez",
         "date-of-birth":"20/08/2000",
         "rol":"User",
         "createdAt":"2022-05-07T14:43:05.620Z",
         "updatedAt":"2022-05-07T14:43:05.620Z",
         "__v":0
      }
   ],
   "limit":20
}
```

Anyone trying to access without administrator permissions will get a 401 error.

```response:401
  {
    "message": "Unauthorized"
  }
```

resources.name: Update User
resources.description:
This will be the path to change the registered user data.

To change the data you need the token and id, if the identifier is not recognized a 401 error message will be returned.

|Parameter| Description|
|---------|-------------|
|Username|The user will optionally enter the new user|
|Password|The user will optionally enter the new password|
|Name|The user will optionally enter the new name|
|date-of-birth|The user will optionally enter the new date of birth.|
|Email|The user will optionally enter the new e-mail address|

```response:401
  {
    "message": "Unauthorized"
  }
```

To change the data you need the token and the id, if the token and the identifier are recognized a message 200 will be returned.

```response:200
  {
    "message": "The user has been updated"
  }
```

resources.name: Delete User
Create User
resources.description:
Here is the path to create users in the API, both administrators and users

|Parameter| Description|
|---------|-------------|
|User|User name you wish to obtain|
|Password|User password you wish to obtain|
|Name|User's full name|
|Date-of-birth|Birthday following the format dd/mm/aaaa|
|Email|User's personal email|
|Rol|User rol|


```response:201
  {
    "message": "User created"
  }
```

resources.name: Login
resources.description:
This will be the path to log in 

|Parameter| Description|
|---------|-------------|
|Username|User identifier|
|Passwoard|Password of the user to log in|

To log in you need the token and the id of the user or administrator, if they are not valid the system will return the error message 401

```response:401
  {
    "message": "Unauthorized"
  }
```

To log in you need the token and the id of the user or administrator, if they are valid the system will return the message 200.

```response:200
  {
    "message": "User found"
  }
```

resources.name: Get one event
resources.description:
This will be the path to obtain the data of a specific activity registered in the application, if the identifier is not found the 404 code error message will be returned and no response will be obtained.

```response:200
{
	"_id": "62761bc560fa60b23ffb9ba3",
	"event": "Clase presencial Calculo",
	"description": "Lleva calculadora TI",
	"date": "2022-05-09T06:00:00.000Z",
	"isAllDay":false,
	"from":"T06:42:17.607Z",
	"to":"T12:42:17.607Z"
	"lastName": "juarez",
	"rol": "Admin",
	"createdAt": "2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
	"updatedAt": "2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
	"__v": 0
}
```

```response:404
{
 	"error": "Event not found"
}
```

resources.name: Get event by date
resources.description:
The path to get events by a selected date, just sending the event date
It will return all events created with that date

**If there´s no events in selected date, 404 Not found will be displayed.**

|Parameters|Description|
|---------|-----------|
|Date|Selected date to filter events|


```response:200
{
	"_id": "62761bc560fa60b23ffb9ba3",
	"event": "Entrega reporte Analisis",
	"description": "Diagrama de contexto",
	"date": "2022-05-20T07:23:43.000Z",
	"isAllDay":true,
	"from":"T06:0:0.0Z",
	"to":"T06:0:0.000Z"
	"lastName": "juarez",
	"rol": "Admin",
	"createdAt": "2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
	"updatedAt": "2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
	"__v": 0
}
```

```response:404
{
"message":"Error there is no event at that date"
}
```

resources.name: Get all events
resources.description:
This is the route to consult the events created by the user.
It will return limited list by the limit parameter
Just send the token in header.

|Parameter| Description|
|---------|-------------|
|Limit|Limit of users to obtain|

```response:200
{
   "count":2,
   "events":[
      {
         "_id":"62761bc560fa60b23ffb9ba3",
         "event":"Clase presencial Calculo",
         "description":"Lleva calculadora TI",
         "date":"2022-05-09T06:00:00.000Z",
         "isAllDay":false,
         "from":"T06:42:17.607Z",
         "to":"T12:42:17.607Z",
         "createdAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "updatedAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "__v":0
      },
      {
         "_id":"62761bc560fa60b23ffb9ba3",
         "event":"Entrega reporte Analisis",
         "description":"Diagrama de contexto",
         "date":"2022-05-20T07:23:43.000Z",
         "isAllDay":true,
         "from":"T06:0:0.0Z",
         "to":"T06:0:0.000Z",
         "createdAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "updatedAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "__v":0
      }
   ],
   "limit":10
}
```

resources.name: Create event
resources.description:
Path to create new events in the API

|Parameters|Description|
|----------|-----------|
|Evento|New event´s name|
|Description| (Optional) New event´s Description |
|Date|Day/month/year for new event |
|Is all day|Indicates if the event will last all day long|
|From|Hour of event begining|
|To|Hour of event ending|
|Recordatory|A recordatory date and hour for the event|


```response:201
{
 "message": "Event created"
}
```

resources.name: Delete event
Update event
resources.description:
You have to add the event´s id to the url

{{url}}/event/edit/{id_event}

It is possible to edit a single parameter at a time

If any user tries to modify a event that does not belong to him, a 401 code will be returned, denying the execution of said action.

If the requested board is not found, it will return 404 code.




|Parameters|Description|
|----------|-----------|
|Evento| (Optional) Updated event´s name|
|Decription| (Optional) Updates event´s Description |
|Date|(Optional) Updated Day/month/year for new event |
|Is all day |(Optional) Indicates if the event will last all day long|
|From |(Optional) Hour of event begining|
|To |(Optional) Hour of event ending|
|Recordatory |(Optional) A recordatory date and hour for the event|


```response:200
{
 "message":"updated"
}
```

```response:401
{
 "error":"Check token"
}
```

```response:404
{
 "error":"event not found"
}
```

resources.name: Get Activity
resources.description:
This will be the path to obtain the data of a specific activity registered in the application, if the identifier is not found the 401 error message will be returned and no response will be obtained.

```response:404
  {
    "message": "Not Found"
  }
```

if the identifier is found, the 200 message will be returned and the response will be obtained.

```response:200
 {
   "_id":"62761bc560fa60b23ffb9ba3",
   "title":"Calculo III",
   "description":"Clase con sosa",
   "start-hour":"7:00 AM",
   "end-hour":"9:00 AM",
   "days":[
      "lunes",
      "miercoles",
      "sabado"
   ],
   "user":{
      "username":"victorcortez358"
   }
}
```

resources.name: Get Activitys
Update Activity
resources.description:
To update a task the user has to send his token and the task id.
 
if the user tries to update a task that does not belong to him the error 401 will be returned, and the execution of the action will be denied.

```response:401
  {
    "message": "Unauthorized"
  }
```

if the token and identifier are valid a 200 message will be returned.

```response:200
  {
    "message": "Activity has been updated"
  }
```

|Parameter| Description|
|---------|-------------|
|Title|The user will optionally enter the new title of the activity|
|Description|The user will optionally enter the new activity description|
|Star-hour|The user will optionally enter the new start time of the activity|
|End-hour|The user will optionally enter the new end time of the activity|
|Days|The user will optionally enter the new day or days on which the activity will take place|

resources.name: Delete Activity
Create Activity
resources.description:
Add a new activity to a day.

|Parameter| Description|
|---------|-------------|
|Title|Title of the activity to be carried out on that day|
|Description|Optionally enter the description of the activity to be performed that day|
|Star-hour|Time at which the activity will start|
|End-hour|Time at which the activity will be finished|
|Days|Se selecciona el dia o los dias en el que la actividad se repetira en la semana|

```response:201
  {
    "message": "Activity create"
  }
```

resources.name: Get boards
resources.description:
This is the route to consult the boards created by the user.
Just send the token in header.

```response:200
{
   "count":2,
   "boards":[
      {
         "_id":"62768579fb3fa259e78928d0",
         "board":"home",
         "decripction":"",
         "createdAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "updatedAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "__v":0
      },
      {
         "_id":"62761bc560fa60b23ffb9ba3",
         "board":"Work",
         "decripction":"workstation tasks",
         "createdAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "updatedAt":"2022-05-07T07:12:05.201Z",
         "__v":0
      }
   ],
   "limit":10
}

```

```response:401
{
 "error": "Auth: Unauthorized to access here, check token"
}
```

resources.name: Board
resources.description:
A kanban board is one of the tools that can be used to implement kanban to manage work at a personal or organizational level.

User can manipulate his own boards and add task to them

resources.name: Create Board
resources.description:
This is the route to create new kamban bord for task in the API

New board will be empty.

|Parameter|Description|
|:---------|------------|
|Board Name|Name for the new board|
|Board Description |(Optional) Description for the new board|

```response:201
{
 "message": "Board created"
}
```

resources.name: Delete board
Update board
resources.description:
You have to add the board´s id to the url

{{url}}board/edit/{id_board}

It is possible to edit a single parameter at a time

If any user tries to modify a board that does not belong to him, a 401 will be returned, denying the execution of said action.

If the requested board is not found, it will return 404.


|Parameter|Description|
|:---------|:-----------|
|Board Name |(Optional) New name for the board to update|
|Board Description| (Optional) New description for the board to update|

```response:200
{
 "message":"board has been updated"
}
```

```response:401
{
 "error":"Check token"
}
```

```response:404
{
 "error":"board not found"
}
```

resources.name: Get task by board
resources.description:
The path to get events by a selected date, just sending the event date
It will return all events created with that date

|Parameters|Description|
|---------|-----------|
|Board id|Selected board id to filter tasks|

```response:200
{
	"_id": "62761bc560fa60b23ffb9ba3",
	"task":"Hacer pedido comida perro",
	"start-date":"2022-05-21T06:00:00.000Z",
	"end-date":"2022-05-028T06:00:00.000Z",
	"star-hour":"T15:30:00.000Z",
	"end-hour":"T13:00:00.000Z",
	"state":"on going",
	"id_board":"62768579fb3fa259e78928d0",
	"createdAt":"2022-05-07T14:43:05.620Z",
	"updatedAt":"2022-05-07T14:43:05.620Z",
	"__v":0
}
```

resources.name: Create task
resources.description:
Add a new task

|Parameter|Description|
|---------|-----------|
|Task|task name|
|start-date|The task will start at|
|end-date|The task will end at|
|start-hour|The task will start at|
|start-hour|The task will end at|

resources.name: Delete task
Update task
resources.description:
You have to add the task´s id to the url

{{url}}task/edit/{id_task}

It is possible to edit a single parameter at a time


If any user tries to modify a task that does not belong to him, a 401 will be returned, denying the execution of said action.

If the requested task is not found, it will return 404



|Parameter|Description|
|---------|-----------|
|Task |(Optional) Updated task name|
|start-date |(Optional) New start date for task|
|end-date |(Optional) New end date for task |
|start-hour |(Optional) New start hour for task|
|end-hour |(Optional) New end hour for task|

```response:200
{
 "message":"task has been updated"
}
```

```response:401
{
 "error":"Check token"
}
```

```response:404
{
 "error":"task not found"
}
```
